translation.en: [Dib] I used to look up at space
with hope and wonder in my eyes.
translation.es: con esperanza... y asombro en mis ojos...

translation.en: Until space looked back.
translation.es: hasta que el espacio me miró.

translation.en: Invader Zim,
evil, alien soldier of the Irken Empire
translation.es: soldado alienígena malvado del Imperio Irken,

translation.en: sent by his diabolical masters, the Almighty Tallest,
translation.es: enviado por sus amos diabólicos, Los Altísimos,

translation.en: to infiltrate Earth and prepare it for the coming invasion.
translation.es: para infiltrarse en la Tierra y prepararla para la próxima invasión.

translation.en: Disguised as one of us,
he moved into my neighborhood,
he went to my school,
and with the help of his vile mechanical servants,
translation.es: y con la ayuda de sus sirvientes viles y mecánicos

translation.en: plotted to destroy everything we have,
translation.es: planearon destruir todo lo que tenemos,

translation.en: -everything we are. -[helicopter whirring]
-[crowd shouting] -And then...
he vanished.
My name is Dib Membrane.
I'm 12 years old.
And I'm all that stands between Zim and the annihilation of our world.
translation.es: y soy lo único que se interpone entre Zim y la aniquilación de nuestro mundo.

translation.en: Prepare your starving, gurgling child-bellies
for the awesome eventuality of dinner!
translation.es: ¡para la increíble eventualidad de la cena!

translation.en: Foodio 3000 hopes you love what I have made.
translation.es: Banquetrón 3000 espera que ames lo que hice.

translation.en: Also, what is love?
Looks great, Dad. I'm gonna eat that food.
translation.es: Se ve genial, papá. Comeré está comida.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Hold up now, daughter!
Isn't it time your brother joined us?
translation.es: ¿No es hora de que llegue tu hermano?

translation.en: Oh, man, no.
Since Zim vanished, Dib's been in his room for, like, a million years.
translation.es: Desde que Zim desapareció, Dib lleva en su cuarto como un millón de años.

translation.en: I hardly recognize him anymore.
He just sits there in that chair getting grosser...
translation.es: Solo se sienta en esa silla, se pone más asqueroso,

translation.en: smellier.
[Professor Membrane] He sure does, but try to be more understanding.
translation.es: Claro que sí, pero trata de ser más comprensiva.

translation.en: Dib's finally letting go of his silly obsession
translation.es: Dib finalmente está superando su tonta obsesión

translation.en: with aliens and ghosts and all his other non-scientific nonsense.
translation.es: con extraterrestres y fantasmas y todas sus tonterías no científicas,

translation.en: And it's not easy for him.
translation.es: y no es fácil para él.

translation.en: Imagine if you stopped believing in, oh, video games.
translation.es: Imagina si tu dejaras de creer en los videojuegos.

translation.en: Don't even joke about that, Dad.
[Professor Membrane] Honey, letting go of silly ideas is just part of growing up.
translation.es: Cariño, superar ideas tontas es parte del crecimiento.

translation.en: Why, as a child, I thought sharks were my friends.
translation.es: Cuando era niño, pensaba que los tiburones eran mis amigos.

translation.en: [in ominous voice] I know better now.
[in normal voice] So, try to be more supportive. He's your brother, after all.
translation.es: Intenta ser más comprensiva. Después de todo, es tu hermano.

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
Hey, Dib! Dad says come to dinner!
translation.es: ¡Oye, Dib! ¡Papá dice que vengas a cenar!

translation.en: [Dib] You know I can't leave my post, Gaz.
translation.es: No puedo dejar mi puesto, Gaz.

translation.en: Just shove the food in here.
Where's the shoving stick? I can't shove without the shoving stick.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el palo? No puedo empujar sin el palo.

translation.en: [Dib] Zim's still out there, Gaz, so I have to wait
translation.es: Zim sigue allá afuera, Gaz, tengo que esperar...

translation.en: and watch.
No one else will. They could never see the truth.
translation.es: Nadie más lo hará. Nunca pudieron ver la verdad. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Why, though? Brainwashing?
translation.es: Nunca pudieron ver la verdad. ¿Por qué? ¿Lavado de cerebro? ¿Control mental?

translation.en: Mind control?
[whispering] Brain-erasing ghosts?
Nobody believes me now, but I'll make them see.
translation.es: Nadie me cree ahora, pero haré que vean.

translation.en: I'll expose Zim to the world, and open humanity's eyes
translation.es: Lo expondré al mundo y abriré los ojos de la humanidad

translation.en: to the danger they were in all along. [chuckles]
translation.es: al peligro en el que estuvieron todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Even Dad, world-famous man of science will say,
translation.es: Hasta papá, el famoso hombre de ciencia dirá:

translation.en: [in strange accent] "I believe you, Dib. I'm sorry I ever doubted you."
translation.es: "Te creo, Dib. Lamento haber dudado de ti".

translation.en: That's the worst Dad impression ever,
translation.es: Esa es la peor imitación de papá,

translation.en: but, Dib, let it go.
Zim's been gone a long time,
translation.es: Zim se fue hace mucho tiempo,

translation.en: and as far as you know, he might just be gone for good.
translation.es: y por lo que se sabe, tal vez se haya ido para siempre.

translation.en: I'd be willing to bet that Zim will never, ever...
translation.es: Estoy dispuesta a apostar que Zim nunca...

translation.en: Oh, wait, there he is.
[Dib screeches] It's Zim!
He's back! And he's doing stretches!
Nobody stretches like that unless they're warming up for evil!
translation.es: Nadie estira así a menos que estén calentando para el mal. Esto es todo.

translation.en: This is it! The... [grunts]
translation.es: Nadie estira así a menos que estén calentando para el mal. Esto es todo. El...

translation.en: moment I've been... [grunts and crashes]
waiting for!
[Gaz] What are you doing?
[groans] Gotta get to Zim!
Dib, no. Look at you.
The world's not ready to see what you've become.
translation.es: El mundo no está listo para ver en qué te has convertido.

translation.en: You're hideous!
The smell!
needs me!
-Take a bath first! -[suit alarm blaring]
Take... [gags]
Take a bath!
No!
Zim!
Yes, it is I, and-- Hmm?
-Oh, wait, sorry. -[flies buzzing]
You'll have to move along, hideous goblin.
translation.es: Lo siento, tienes que moverte, horrible duende.

translation.en: I'm posing dramatically for when the Dib shows up.
translation.es: Estoy posando dramáticamente para cuando aparezca Dib.

translation.en: -I am Dib. -What?
-Give me a sec here. -[stammers] We know each other.
-[thunder claps] -I've been expecting you, Dib!
I can tell. You set up sprinklers and everything.
translation.es: Me doy cuenta, pusiste rociadores y todo.

translation.en: -[gurgles] -You can't prove anything!
-Anyhow, I-- -Where have you been, Zim?
I've been monitoring your house, the school,
that taco place you love so much.
translation.es: la escuela, ese lugar de tacos que tanto amas.

translation.en: No, no. GIR loves that place. I think it's dirty.
translation.es: No, Gir adora ese lugar. Yo creo que es sucio.

translation.en: -[GIR] I ate a baby there. -He did.
translation.es: - Me comí un bebé ahí. - Sí.

translation.en: What have you been up to, Zim?
Phase one of my evil plan, human.
translation.es: Fase uno de mi malvado plan, humano.

translation.en: Phase one.
Computer! Laugh with me! [Computer] I don't want to.
You've been in your house sitting in the toilet all this time?
translation.es: ¿Estuviste en tu casa, sentado en un inodoro todo este tiempo?

translation.en: -Yes. -Like, the whole time?
That's right.
Did you have to sit in the toilet?
Do not try to understand the ways of my people, Dib!
translation.es: ¡No trates de entender las costumbres de mi gente, Dib!

translation.en: From the moment my mission began
translation.es: Desde el momento en que mi misión comenzó en este horrible planeta,

translation.en: on this horrible planet, you've been there,
translation.es: Desde el momento en que mi misión comenzó en este horrible planeta, has estado ahí, acechando cada movimiento como un squack en mi shmoopsquizz.

translation.en: haunting my every move like a squak in my shmoopsquizz.
translation.es: has estado ahí, acechando cada movimiento como un squack en mi shmoopsquizz.

translation.en: -A what in your huh? -Uh-huh!
And while the rest of your kind were easily fooled,
translation.es: Y mientras el resto de su especie era fácil de engañar,

translation.en: you were able to see through my brilliant disguise.
translation.es: tú pudiste ver a través de mi genial disfraz.

translation.en: [stammers] Martha!
-[screeches] Eh? -The neighbor boy's an alien!
[stammers] Never mind, Martha. -He's normal. -Okay.
I knew if I vanished for long enough, you'd just watch and wait,
translation.es: Sabía que si desaparecía suficiente tiempo, tú solo mirarías y esperarías,

translation.en: your neglected body growing smelly
translation.es: tu cuerpo descuidado se volvería apestoso,

translation.en: -and useless. -[Dib whimpering]
But that was only Phase One of my evil plan.
translation.es: Pero esa fue la fase uno de mi malvado plan.

translation.en: Well, keep watching, Dookie-Dib. Watch helplessly as I begin...
translation.es: Bueno, sigue mirando, Popó-Dib. Mira impotente mientras yo comienzo...

translation.en: Phase Two!
I'm switching people's mail around.
translation.es: - ¡No! - Cambiaré el correo de la gente.

translation.en: That's illegal. No!
I'm reading someone's newspaper. I don't pay for a subscription. [laughs]
translation.es: Estoy leyendo el periódico de alguien. No pago la suscripción.

translation.en: Nobody reads newspapers anymore, but, no, stop!
translation.es: Ya nadie lee periódicos, pero no, ¡alto!

translation.en: Minimoose, get in on this mayhem!
That's my mom's pizza sticker.
translation.es: Es la etiqueta de pizza de mi mamá.

translation.en: She is crazy for pizza.
Hey, what... what are you... Hey, that... that's...
Hey, don't... Wait.
Don't! Don't! Don't!
Excellent.
Me! Me! Let me do one.
I launched that pug into space.
translation.es: Lancé a ese pug al espacio.

translation.en: -I thought you liked that pig. -[car alarm goes off]
translation.es: Creí que te gustaba ese cerdo.

translation.en: -Why I do that? -What's the matter, human?
translation.es: ¿Por qué hice eso? ¿Qué te pasa, humano?

translation.en: Why aren't you stopping me?
Can't fight back.
Sat too long.
Chair fused to butt.
translation.es: La silla se fusionó con el trasero.

translation.en: More chair than man now.
Humans are such fragile, goopy things.
translation.es: Los humanos son tan frágiles y pegajosos.

translation.en: No Irken would ever become a chair.
translation.es: Ningún Irken se convertiría en una silla.

translation.en: Wait! Was that Phase Two?
Of course it was!
Probably. Uh... You know what? Now I'm not sure.
translation.es: Probablemente. ¿Sabes qué? Ahora no estoy seguro.

translation.en: Either way, you're helpless to stop me, Chair-Dib. So long!
translation.es: De cualquier forma, eres incapaz de detenerme Silla-Dib. ¡Hasta luego!

translation.en: [both] Welcome home, son.
Zim!
Excellent work, me.
All is going according to plan, but there's still much to do, GIR.
translation.es: Todo va según el plan, pero aún hay mucho por hacer, Gir.

translation.en: Yes, sir! [shouts]
[shouts] I bloop you, Schmoopsy!
[chuckles warmly] Floopsy...
Computer?
[Computer groans] What?
Open a connection with the Almighty Tallest,
translation.es: Abre una conexión con Los Altísimos,

translation.en: my leaders and biggest fans.
translation.es: mis líderes y mis más grandes admiradores.

translation.en: [Computer] Preparing to call The Tallest. You see, GIR, The Tallest--
translation.es: - Preparando para llamar al Altísimo. - Verás, Gir...

translation.en: [Computer] Now calling The Tallest!
The Tallest haven't heard from me,
translation.es: Los Altísimos no han sabido de mí,

translation.en: their greatest and most incredible invader,
translation.es: su más grande e increíblemente innovador,

translation.en: in a very long time.
-They'll be sick with worry. -[GIR squeaks]
translation.es: Han de estar muy preocupados. LOS ALTÍSIMOS

translation.en: Hey, remember Invader Zim?
-Who? -Zim. Tiny?
Screamed a lot?
The guy that sends us the donuts?
translation.es: ¿El tipo que nos envía las donas?

translation.en: No, that's Invader Jim. He's great.
translation.es: No, ese es el invasor Jim. Es genial.

translation.en: Oh, wait. Zim.
-We hate him! -Yeah, that's him. [chuckles]
Remember the time we lied and told him we were sending him on a secret mission to Earth,
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas la vez que le mentimos y lo mandamos a una misión a la Tierra,

translation.en: but really we were just getting rid of him because he's awful?
translation.es: pero en realidad nos estábamos deshaciendo de él porque es horrible?

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. We're hilarious.
[comms officer] My Tallest, there's an incoming transmission.
translation.es: ¿Mis Altísimos? - Hay una transmisión entrante. - Sí.

translation.en: Yep, life's been pretty great ever since Zim vanished for good.
translation.es: La vida ha sido genial desde que Zim desapareció para siempre.

translation.en: Anyhow, send that transmission through.
I wonder who it could ever be. It is I, Zim!
translation.es: - Me pregunto quién puede ser. - ¡Soy yo, Zim!

translation.en: My Tallest, you will be overjoyed to know
translation.es: Mis Altísimos, estarán encantados de saber que la Fase uno de mi plan más ingenioso

translation.en: Phase One of my most ingenious plan
translation.es: estarán encantados de saber que la Fase uno de mi plan más ingenioso

translation.en: to prepare Earth for your arrival was a success.
translation.es: para preparar la Tierra para su llegada fue un éxito.

translation.en: Zim, we thought you were dead.
Could a dead Zim do this?
[clears throat] Sirs, my Earthly arch-nemesis is now a sad chair,
translation.es: Señores, mi archienemigo terrenal ahora es una silla triste,

translation.en: leaving me free to complete the most diabolical phase of my plan,
translation.es: dejándome libre para completar la fase más diabólica de mi plan,

translation.en: Phase Two,
wherein I, uh...
Computer, put them on hold. Oh, no.
translation.es: Computadora, ponlos en espera. Ay, no, realmente no recuerdo cuál es la Fase Dos.

translation.en: I really can't remember what Phase Two is.
translation.es: Ay, no, realmente no recuerdo cuál es la Fase Dos.

translation.en: I must have sat in that toilet too long. Think, Zim. Think.
translation.es: Debo haberme sentado en ese inodoro demasiado tiempo. Piensa, Zim, piensa.

translation.en: We don't care, Zim.
[grunts] Why didn't I write it down?
Wait! Computer,
translation.es: ¿Por qué no lo escribí? ¡Espera! ¿Computadora? Reproduce las grabaciones de mí discutiendo la Fase Dos.

translation.en: play back any recordings of me discussing Phase Two.
translation.es: ¿Computadora? Reproduce las grabaciones de mí discutiendo la Fase Dos.

translation.en: [Computer] One recording found.
Would you like me to record any and all mention of Phase Two?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que grabe alguna mención de la Fase Dos?

translation.en: No, thank you. Zim forgets nothing.
translation.es: No, gracias. Zim no olvida nada.

translation.en: Hmm, besides reminding me how cool I look and sound, that was of no help.
translation.es: Además de recordarme lo genial que me veo y sueno, eso no sirvió de nada.

translation.en: He knows we can still see and hear him, right?
translation.es: Sabe que podemos verlo y escucharlo, ¿verdad?

translation.en: I liked when he was dead.
[shouts excitedly] I remember Phase Two!
You do? Good work, GIR! Tell me.
You gonna order a million pizzas,
translation.es: Tienes que pedir un millón de pizzas,

translation.en: and then I gotta roll around in them pizzas,
translation.es: y luego yo tengo que dar vueltas en las pizzas,

translation.en: and that's the story about how I turn into a giant pizza.
translation.es: y esa es la historia de cómo me convierto en una pizza gigante.

translation.en: This isn't the time for the giant pizza story, GIR.
translation.es: ¡No es el momento para la historia de la pizza gigante, Gir,

translation.en: And that will never happen!
Silence! I need to think! Just calm down and...
Computer, did you put The Tallest on hold?
-[Computer] Nope. -[screams]
I don't think they heard anything. Yes, they did.
translation.es: - Creo que no se oyeron nada. - Sí oyeron.

translation.en: I am Irk's finest Invader.
translation.es: Soy el mejor invasor de Irk.

translation.en: If The Tallest find out I failed to dominate the Earth
translation.es: Si Los Altísimos se enteran que no pude dominar la Tierra

translation.en: because I forgot Phase Two,
who knows what they'll do?
[Almighty Tallest Red] Invader Zim,
you were once our best, most amazing Invader,
translation.es: alguna vez fuiste nuestro mejor y más increíble invasor.

translation.en: but now, you're dumb.
Also, stupid.
As punishment, you will be stripped of your Invader rank,
translation.es: Como castigo, serás despojado de tu rango de invasor,

translation.en: re-encoded as nothing.
But you can't! I am Zim!
[Almighty Tallest Red] Control Brains, re-encode.
[Control Brains] Re-encoding.
It is done, My Tallest.
Zim, you will live out
translation.es: ¿Zim? Vivirás el resto de tus largos y tristes días como...

translation.en: the rest of your long, sad days as--
translation.es: Vivirás el resto de tus largos y tristes días como...

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -Wait, no, never mind.
GIR, time is of the essence.
-The Tallest could be here any day now... -[gasps] ...and Dib won't stay a chair forever.
translation.es: Los Altísimos podrían venir cualquier día, y Dib no será una silla para siempre.

translation.en: Go to my scheming lab, and bring me everything that could be Phase Two.
translation.es: Ve a mi laboratorio y tráeme todo lo que podría ser la Fase Dos.

translation.en: -Quickly! -[squeals]
Useless dookie!
I need more time to remember Phase Two.
translation.es: Necesito más tiempo para recordar la Fase Dos.

translation.en: Computer, how much longer do I have before The Tallest arrive?
translation.es: Computadora, ¿cuánto tiempo me queda antes de que lleguen Los Altísimos?

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Computer] Information unknown. Unacceptable.
Access The Tallest's computers and retrieve their flight plan.
translation.es: Accede a las computadoras de Los Altísimos y recupera su plan de vuelo.

translation.en: [Computer imitating British accent] Ooh, yes, right away, sir.
[Zim] Are you doing an accent?
[Computer in normal accent] I get bored.
P.S. There is insufficient power to access the flight plan.
translation.es: No había suficiente poder para acceder al plan de vuelo.

translation.en: Then find more power, and be sneaky about it.
translation.es: Entonces encuentra más poder y sé sigiloso.

translation.en: [Computer] Activating sneaky mode.
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
[Computer] Flight plan retrieved.
[Zim] Along this line is every world the Irken Armada plans to conquer,
translation.es: En esta línea están todos los mundos que la Armada Irken planea conquistar.

translation.en: but where's Earth?
The Tallest said it was the most important mission of all.
translation.es: El Altísimo dijo que era la misión más importante de todas.

translation.en: Computer, zoom out.
[Computer] Zooming out.
Keep zooming out until you find out how far The Tallest are from Earth.
translation.es: Sigue alejándote hasta que veas qué tan lejos están Los Altísimos de la Tierra.

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out.
Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
-Hurry it up. -Zooming out.
-Zooming out. -Vámonos!
I must begin Phase Two
before Dib gets back into annoying fighting shape.
translation.es: antes de que Dib vuelva a estar en su molesta forma de pelea.

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
Hmm, I'm sure it's there,
translation.es: Alejando. Estoy seguro de que está ahí...

translation.en: -somewhere. -Zooming out.
Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
I was in bad shape, then I got too in shape,
translation.es: Estaba muy mal. Luego me puse demasiado en forma.

translation.en: now I'm back to normal shape.
Oh, man, Dib, not the coat.
translation.es: Ay no, Dib, no el abrigo.

translation.en: It makes me look mysterious.
Now, step aside. I've got a Zim to stop.
translation.es: Ahora, hazte a un lado. Tengo que detener a un Zim.

translation.en: All right, test children.
These bracelets are just prototypes,
translation.es: estas pulseras son solo prototipos, así que intenten no respirar

translation.en: so try not to breathe or think while the energy field is--
translation.es: estas pulseras son solo prototipos, así que intenten no respirar o pensar mientras el campo de energía...

translation.en: -[Dib grunts] -What? Oh.
Behold, my boy child!
I can't remember the last time I saw you this excited about science.
translation.es: No recuerdo la última vez que te vi tan emocionado por la ciencia.

translation.en: Huh? My new Peace Day edition Membracelet.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Mi nuevo Membrazalete del Día de la Paz.

translation.en: Tomorrow at my big keynote event, I reveal it to the world.
translation.es: Mañana, en mi gran presentación, se lo revelaré al mundo,

translation.en: And when Peace Day comes,
translation.es: y cuando llegue el Día de la Paz,

translation.en: the children of the Earth will hold hands and...
translation.es: los niños de la Tierra se tomarán de la mano y... Esperen.

translation.en: The alien-hunting briefcase? Oh, son.
translation.es: ¿El maletín de caza alienígena? Ay, hijo.

translation.en: Not this nonsense again.
Dad, trying to save the Earth from Zim's alien evil is not nonsense.
translation.es: Papá, tratar de salvar a la Tierra del mal alienígena de Zim no es una tontería.

translation.en: Without me, there might not be an Earth to hold hands around.
translation.es: Sin mí no habría una Tierra para tomarse de las manos.

translation.en: -[children groaning] -Son, there are no aliens.
I've tried to be patient with your unscientific interests...
translation.es: Traté de ser paciente con tus intereses no científicos:

translation.en: -[children shouting] -...bigfeets, ghosts, vampire-bees...
You saw those sting marks, and you know I eat a lot of honey now.
translation.es: ¡Viste esos piquetes! ¡Y sabes que ahora como mucha miel!

translation.en: Well, as a man of science, I need proof, and I just haven't seen--
translation.es: Bueno, como hombre de ciencia, necesito pruebas y no las he visto...

translation.en: Proof? Proof?
How do you need more proof than this?
Everything I've collected from my countless battles with Zim,
translation.es: Todo lo que he recogido de mis innumerables batallas con Zim,

translation.en: from my daring travels into the unknown things your science has closed its eyes to.
translation.es: de mis audaces viajes a lo desconocido, cosas que tu ciencia no quiere ver.

translation.en: It makes it very difficult to get to the lawnmower.
translation.es: Hace muy difícil llegar a la podadora.

translation.en: That's Tak's ship, an alien spaceship
translation.es: Esa es la nave de Tak. ¡Una nave alienígena que capturé de uno de los enemigos alienígenas de Zim!

translation.en: I captured from one of Zim's alien enemies.
translation.es: ¡Una nave alienígena que capturé de uno de los enemigos alienígenas de Zim!

translation.en: Shouldn't spaceships fly?
It will, as soon as it lets me fix it.
translation.es: Lo hará, en cuanto me deje arreglarla.

translation.en: -[metal clangs] -[Tak's ship] Dib, your face is stupid.
[Professor Membrane] It's a fine, fake spaceship you've built there, son, but--
translation.es: Es una linda nave espacial falsa que construiste, hijo, pero...

translation.en: Fake? It's not...
Dad, nobody believes me,
so I'm used to defending our world on my own,
translation.es: estoy acostumbrado a defender el mundo yo solo,

translation.en: but I wish, just once, you'd have my back.
translation.es: pero desearía que, por una vez, me apoyaras.

translation.en: Wishing isn't very scientific, son.
translation.es: Desear no es muy científico, hijo.

translation.en: [Dib] This ends today, Zim!
I'm ready for everything you got!
translation.es: ¡Estoy listo para todo lo que tengas!

translation.en: [announcer on TV] Welcome back once again...
translation.es: Bienvenido una vez más a nuestro...

translation.en: -Uh... -...countdown to Peace Day...
Intruder! Prepare to come on in!
[on TV] I'm Ian Cornish, your host, on this beautiful, sunny day.
translation.es: Soy Ian Bywish, su anfitrión, en este día tan hermoso y soleado.

translation.en: And joining us for our countdown to Peace Day
translation.es: y con nosotros para la cuenta atrás para el Día de la Paz,

translation.en: is Bloaty the Pig.
What do you have for us, Bloaty?
Hey, Zim's evil robot. -Where's Zim? -Mmm-mmm.

translation.es: Ahora presta mucha atención a ese jamón,

translation.en: 'cause it's not the last time you're gonna see that ham in the story.
translation.es: porque no es la última vez que verás ese jamón en la historia.

translation.en: -[muffled grunting] -Dad, you and Dib need more father-son time together.
translation.es: Papá, tú y Dib necesitan más tiempo de padre e hijo juntos.

translation.en: Just look at him. He's all messed up, needs more quality time with you.
translation.es: Solo míralo. Está muy mal. Necesita más tiempo de calidad contigo.

translation.en: Ooh, I see what you mean. You got any suggestions?
translation.es: Veo a qué te refieres. ¿Tienes alguna sugerencia?

translation.en: This was a good idea, honey.
translation.es: Esta fue una buena idea, cariño.

translation.en: Science projects bring families together.
translation.es: Los proyectos científicos unen a las familias.

translation.en: How can I help you, son?
You need me to put some science pudding on it?
translation.es: ¿Necesitas que le ponga un poco de budín de ciencia?

translation.en: Uh, maybe later.
You just keep stirring, uh, Dad.
[Tak's ship] Festering human, you have stolen me away from my rightful owner!
translation.es: ¡Humano asqueroso! ¡Me has robado de mi legítimo dueño!

translation.en: Look, ship, I get that you don't like me and all, but we need your help.
translation.es: Mira, nave, entiendo que no te agrado, pero necesitamos tu ayuda.

translation.en: [Tak's ship] I don't help anyone but Tak.
See? It's no use.
-You hate Dib, right? -Affirmative.
But you hate Zim even more. Correct.
translation.es: - ¿Pero odias aún más a Zim? - Correcto.

translation.en: I see where you're going with this.
translation.es: Ya entendí lo que estás haciendo.

translation.en: Helping us break our dad out of Moopington would--
translation.es: Ayudándonos a sacar a nuestro papá de Mooppington...

translation.en: Wait, do you mean Moo-Ping 10?
Right.
It would make Zim super unhappy.
[Tak's ship] Flawless logic. I will help you.
[both] Yes!
-[Tak's ship] On one condition. -What's that?
Disconnect my seat sensors
translation.es: Desconecta los sensores de mi asiento para que no sienta

translation.en: so I don't feel your terrible human butts in me.
translation.es: Desconecta los sensores de mi asiento para que no sienta sus terribles traseros humanos.

translation.en: Deal.
We did it, kids. Hurray for science.
translation.es: Lo hicimos, niños. ¡Hurra por la ciencia!

translation.en: Right. Now, about that pudding...
Don't wait up for us, Clembrane!
[both] Yeah!
-[Florpus Hole crackling] -[Tak's ship] Oh. You guys have a deadly Florpus Hole now.
translation.es: Ahora tienen un hoyo Florpus mortal.

translation.en: -That's new. -[Dib] Yeah.
translation.es: - Eso es nuevo. - Sí, hay que apurarnos, nave.

translation.en: -Let's hurry, ship. -Don't tell me what to do.
translation.es: - Eso es nuevo. - Sí, hay que apurarnos, nave. No me digas qué hacer, pero está bien.

translation.en: But okay.
translation.es: No me digas qué hacer, pero está bien.

translation.en: Now, this is what I like to see, GIR.
translation.es: Esto es lo que me gusta ver, Gir.

translation.en: Pathetic humans fleeing in terror at the sight of Zim!
translation.es: Humanos patéticos huyendo aterrorizados al ver a Zim.

translation.en: [GIR] Nobody even looking at you.
-[car alarm goes off] -It's a show of respect.
Their stupid eyes can't handle all this.
translation.es: ¡Sus estúpidos ojos no pueden con todo esto!

translation.en: Anyhow, terrible work on the signs, GIR,
translation.es: De todos modos, un trabajo terrible en los carteles.

translation.en: worse than I expected.
Aww, thank you.
Did you build me that throne I asked for?
[Zim] Excellent.
Now, to ascend this throne,
translation.es: Ahora, para ascender a este trono

translation.en: and claim my rightful place as...
Hah! But where are the flames?
translation.es: ¿Dónde están las llamas? No puedo gobernar el mundo sin llamas

translation.en: I can't rule the world without cool flames shooting up behind me.
translation.es: ¿Dónde están las llamas? No puedo gobernar el mundo sin llamas disparadas tras de mí.

translation.en: Hit the flames button!
Wait, are those peanuts?
[GIR] Oops.
Try the peanuts button.
translation.es: - Prueba el botón de maní. - Muy bien.

translation.en: [Zim] All right, flames, uh, peanuts,
translation.es: - Prueba el botón de maní. - Muy bien. ¿Llamas? ¿Maní?

translation.en: flames, uh, peanuts?
[screams] The peanuts! [laughing] Oh, whoa, whoa.
The Tallest will be so happy!
[The Tallest moaning] We're so unhappy!
Zim's so close, I can almost smell him.
translation.es: Zim está tan cerca que casi puedo olerlo.

translation.en: [comms office] Sirs, really, it's no big deal.
translation.es: Señores, en serio, no es gran cosa.

translation.en: We can just steer around the--
Wait, why steer around the Earth when we can just blow it up?
translation.es: ¿Por qué rodear la Tierra cuando podemos hacerlo explotar?

translation.en: Yeah, we're great at blowing stuff up. -[alert blips] -What is that?
translation.es: Sí, somos geniales para hacer explotar cosas. ¿Qué es eso?

translation.en: -[comms officer] It appears to be a-- -Blow it up!
[comms office] But, sirs, there's still the life-destroying space hole to consider.
translation.es: Pero, señores, aún hay un agujero espacial que destruye la vida.

translation.en: Man, this guy.
[mockingly] "I fly the spaceship, and I sure love steering!"
translation.es: "¡Yo vuelo la nave y me encanta dirigir!".

translation.en: [mockingly] "Ooh, look at me steering all over the place.
Look at me steering with my wittle steering hands."
translation.es: ¡Mírame manejando con mis manitas de manejar!".

translation.en: I like that we're funny.
-[music stops] -[both] Hey!
[Tak's ship] Your noises are bad. Also, we're here.
translation.es: - ¡Oye! - Sus sonidos son malos. Además, ya llegamos.

translation.en: Moo-Ping 10,
prison to the galaxy's most infamous criminals.
translation.es: Prisión para los criminales más infames de la galaxia.

translation.en: Okay, their defenses are about to go down.
translation.es: Bien, las defensas están a punto de caer.

translation.en: How do you know?
[Tak's ship] Just get ready.
All right, now what?
[Tak's ship] I'll go cause a diversion and come back when you've found your dog.
translation.es: Causaré una distracción y volveré cuando encuentren a su perro.

translation.en: -Our dad. -Whatever.
That's our diversion. You ready?
I was born ready, Gaz. This spy coat isn't just to look cool.
translation.es: Nací listo, Gaz. Esta capa de espía no es solo para verme bien.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Dib] Now we'll never find Dad!
normally, you crying on the floor is hilarious, but come on.
translation.es: Normalmente, que llores en el suelo es gracioso, pero vamos.

translation.en: It's all my fault, Gaz. [groans]
Why aren't you saying I told you so?
'Cause making fun of you is no fun when you're this sad.
translation.es: Porque burlarse de ti no es divertido cuando estás tan triste.

translation.en: You're my brother, man.
I only torment you because I know you can handle it.
translation.es: Solo te atormento porque sé que puedes manejarlo.

translation.en: I've done way worse than throwing you in a space prison.
translation.es: He hecho mucho peor que meterte a una prisión espacial.

translation.en: This is nothing. Get up!
I was supposed to save the world, Gaz, not help Zim destroy it.
translation.es: Se suponía que debía salvar al mundo, Gaz, no ayudar a Zim a destruirlo.

translation.en: I was gonna show people the truth.
translation.es: Iba a mostrarle la verdad a la gente.

translation.en: I knew if they saw something amazing,
translation.es: Sabía que si veían algo increíble.

translation.en: even if it was horrible, like Zim, people would just wake up,
translation.es: Aunque fuera horrible, como Zim, la gente despertaría

translation.en: and stop obsessing over all the little things
translation.es: y dejarían de obsesionarse con todas las cositas

translation.en: and see that there was something bigger out there,
translation.es: y verían que hay algo más grande ahí afuera.

translation.en: something to unite against.
Instead of fighting each other, the world would know there was--
translation.es: en vez de pelear entre nosotros, el mundo sabría que hubo...

translation.en: [Gaz] Hey, Dib! Shut up and look!
-Dad! -[Professor Membrane] Son!
-[aliens] Aww! -[Professor Membrane] I didn't want to interrupt your lovely, imaginary speech.
translation.es: No quise interrumpir tu hermoso e imaginario discurso.

translation.en: Imaginary?
Well, the last thing I remember was something hitting me on the head
translation.es: Bueno, lo último que recuerdo es algo que me golpeó en la cabeza

translation.en: and starting this incredible hallucination.
No, this is all really happening.
Zim used your bracelets to teleport the Earth
translation.es: Zim usó tus brazaletes para teletransportar la Tierra

translation.en: to another part of the universe!
Do you know how?
[alien] Uh, he's not gonna know how.
[Professor Membrane] Son, the Membracelet is just for running apps
translation.es: Hijo, el membrazalete es solo para ejecutar aplicaciones y la paz mundial

translation.en: and world peace, but, oh, theoretically...
translation.es: Hijo, el membrazalete es solo para ejecutar aplicaciones y la paz mundial pero teóricamente, se podría usar para, digamos,

translation.en: -[aliens gasp] -...one could use it to, say,
translation.es: pero teóricamente, se podría usar para, digamos,

translation.en: create a galactic star gate of sorts, yes.
translation.es: crear una especie de puerta galáctica, sí.

translation.en: What?
That's crazy, yo.
Well, we knew it was possible,
but only with the addition of a purely theoretical
translation.es: pero solo con la adición de una meramente teórica,

translation.en: alien horror blob energized by a purely theoretical
translation.es: masa extraterrestre, energizada por un, puramente teórico, mini alce morado del espacio.

translation.en: -tiny purple space moose. -[aliens chuckling]
translation.es: energizada por un, puramente teórico, mini alce morado del espacio.

translation.en: But all those things don't exist, so we didn't worry about it.
translation.es: Pero esas cosas no existen, así que no nos preocupamos.

translation.en: Minimoose!
Dad, if you had that purple space moose, could you use it to teleport the Earth
translation.es: Papá, si tuvieras ese alce morado, ¿podrías usarlo para teletransportar

translation.en: back where it belongs?
Theoretically, mmm-hmm.
Too bad we're in prison.
[Tak's ship] Three human butts is too many, so I brought this.
translation.es: Tres traseros humanos son demasiados, así que traje esto.

translation.en: Hop in.
[Professor Membrane] This is all so real!
translation.es: - Esto es muy real. - No es una alucinación.

translation.en: -Not a hallucination. -[Gaz] Shotgun!
translation.es: - Esto es muy real. - No es una alucinación. Copiloto.

translation.en: -[aliens cheering] -[alien] See you later!
Only enough room in there for you guys, I guess.
translation.es: Solo hay espacio suficiente para ustedes, supongo.

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Hang on to your disgusting butts!
What's with you and butts?
[laughs maniacally] Okay, okay. Okay, enough running and screaming. Let's mix it up a bit.
translation.es: ¡Bueno! Basta de correr y gritar, vamos a hacer algo nuevo.

translation.en: Maybe bow down before me or something.
translation.es: Tal vez inclínense ante mí o algo así.

translation.en: Hmm, leaping is good.
[Professor Membrane] Well, that was very convincing.
Because it's real, Dad!
[Professor Membrane] How could anything that horrifying be real?
translation.es: ¿Cómo algo tan horrible puede ser real?

translation.en: Dad, the Earth's minutes away from being destroyed!
translation.es: Papá, la Tierra está a minutos de ser destruida.

translation.en: Why are you laughing?
[Professor Membrane] Minimoose is a funny name.
translation.es: Mini alce es un nombre gracioso.

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Normally, I'd say "Don't touch me," but maybe a little help?
translation.es: Normalmente diría que no me toques, pero ¿qué tal un poco de ayuda?

translation.en: -[alarms blaring] -[Tak's ship] This isn't good.
Gaz!
[Professor Membrane] Marvelous!
I truly believe I'm falling to a hideous death!
translation.es: Realmente creo que estoy cayendo en una muerte horrible.

translation.en: Hang on, Dad!
Don't let go!
[Professor Membrane] Don't worry. None of this is real.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Esto no es real.

translation.en: -I'll prove everything to you. -[cat meows]
Just hang on!
You'll be proud of me!
[Professor Membrane] Son, you don't have to prove anything.
translation.es: Hijo, no tienes que probar nada.

translation.en: I'm always proud of you.
Dad!
[Zim] I did it, GIR.
The humans cower in fear before my superior Irken might,
translation.es: Los humanos se encogen de miedo ante mi fuerza superior Irken,

translation.en: and just in time.
Is that The Tallest I see approa--
Dib?
You...
Give me the moose.
Zim, that moose is the only thing
translation.es: ¡Zim! Ese alce es lo único que puede salvar a la Tierra de tu Florbus.

translation.en: that can save Earth from your Florpus!
translation.es: Ese alce es lo único que puede salvar a la Tierra de tu Florbus.

translation.en: [grunts] Get your own moose, human! -This one's mine! -[squeaks]
translation.es: ¡Consigue tu propio alce, humano! ¡Este es mío!

translation.en: Hah, I think you're cool too, Minimoose.
translation.es: Yo también creo que eres genial, Mini alce.

translation.en: [Dib] Stop! We're running out of time!
[Zim] You're ugly when you lie, Dib!
[Dib] I'm not lying! [Zim] Then why are you ugly?
translation.es: - No miento. - Entonces, ¿por qué eres feo?

translation.en: -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No!
[Zim] I liked you better when you were a chair!
translation.es: Me caías mejor cuando eras una silla.

translation.en: And I liked you better when you were a toilet!
translation.es: Y tú me caías mejor cuando eras un inodoro.

translation.en: I was not a toilet!
[Dib grunting] Leprechaun cat, no--
I was hiding in the toilet.
Zim!
No!
Well, he's dead.
GIR, all this evil is doing a number on my throat.
translation.es: Todo este mal me está lastimando la garganta.

translation.en: Fetch me a soothing lozenge!
Dad!
[Professor Membrane] Why are you wearing those shirts?
I never hired any of you!
[Professor Membrane] Don't worry, son.
I've got your back.
Spencer! Devon!
-Maria! -[Professor Membrane] Come on!
Lawrence!
No!
GIR, avenge your robot brothers and Maria.
translation.es: ¡Gir, venga a tus hermanos robot! Y a María.

translation.en: Yes, my master!
You're terrible, GIR!
It's over, Zim.
-[sips] -Oh, it is?
Well, now I'm sad. Wait! Have you forgotten?
You're grounded!
-And you, get away from my son! -[choking]
-[babbles] -...what's happening? -[babbles] -What is this thing?
-He's you, Dad. -[Professor Membrane] What?
Who's me, son? I'm me.
translation.es: ¿Quién es yo, hijo? Yo soy yo. Pero ¿ese quién es?

translation.en: But who's that? Pudding break.
translation.es: ¿Quién es yo, hijo? Yo soy yo. Pero ¿ese quién es? Descanso de budín.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I'm very confused right now.
[Zim] So, it has been revealed.
You've discovered the clone is not actually your real father!
translation.es: ¡Descubriste que el clon no es tu verdadero padre!

translation.en: You told me he wasn't my real father.
translation.es: Me dijiste que no era mi verdadero padre.

translation.en: Pudding break over. [Professor Membrane] Oh, this feels so real!
translation.es: - Se acabó el descanso de budín. - ¡Esto se siente tan real!

translation.en: -We need that moose, Dad! -[crashes in distance]
[laughs] Nothing's uglier than moose jealousy, Dib.
translation.es: Nada es más feo que los celos por un alce, Dib. ¿Qué?

translation.en: Ooh, what the... Where did--
translation.es: Nada es más feo que los celos por un alce, Dib. ¿Qué? ¿A dónde...?

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Yours is the worst... [glitching] butt of them... butt of them all, Zim.
translation.es: El tuyo es el peor trasero de todos, Zim.

translation.en: Dib!
Do you still have that ham I gave you?
translation.es: ¿Aún tienes el jamón que te di?

translation.en: Of course!
The ham!
[narrator] See? There's that ham again.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Ahí está el jamón otra vez.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Great work, honey, but...
Honey, fighting doodn't solve anything.
Also, I found this little moose thing. Look at it. Isn't it funny?
translation.es: También encontré algo este alce. ¡Míralo! ¿No es gracioso?

translation.en: I command you to return the moose
translation.es: Te ordeno que devuelvas al alce,

translation.en: and destroy the Membrane family!
translation.es: y destruyas a la familia Membrana.

translation.en: But... they my family.
And that guy, it's like looking into a mirror.
translation.es: Y ese tipo, es como verme en un espejo.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Oh, I don't know about-- [grunts angrily] I should've known you'd fail me!
translation.es: - No sé... - Debí saber que me fallarías.

translation.en: You couldn't even learn to make pudding the right way.
translation.es: Ni siquiera aprendiste a hacer el budín de la manera correcta.

translation.en: Hey! You leave Clembrane alone!
translation.es: Oye, deja a Clonbrana en paz.

translation.en: Yeah! [in British accent] It's the best pudding I've ever had in my life.
translation.es: Sí, es el mejor budín que he comido en mi vida.

translation.en: Excellent. Now, just...
-No! -[squeals]
[gasps] It's happening!
Use the moose!
[Professor Membrane] Uh, right. Use the moose.
Um, okay.
Everyone, hold hands again.
translation.es: ¡Todos, tómense de las manos otra vez!

translation.en: [Gaz in normal accent] Yeah! Your lives depend on it!
Okay! Hold my hand.
No way! Be serious!
Now, come on, everyone. Faster!
I did my best.
It's no use, Dib.
You've lost. The Irken Armada is already here.
translation.es: Perdiste. La Armada Irken ya está aquí.

translation.en: Forward cannons now at full power.
[Professor Membrane] Almost have it.
Dad, hurry!
We're entering the Florpus!
[Zim] Zim has won!
No pressure, Dad,
[Professor Membrane] Cut me some slack! This is my first moose!
translation.es: Dame chance, este es mi primer alce.

translation.en: Relax. [in distorted voice] It's just realities colliding like my computer said.
translation.es: Relájate. Solo son realidades que colisionan, como dijo mi computadora.

translation.en: [in distorted voice] And tearing Earth apart, you moron!
[stammers] Oh, no.
[Professor Membrane] I've got it!
My Tallest, the Earth...
It's gone.
That's great news.
-Crisis averted. -Hurray!
translation.es: Crisis evitada. ¡Hurra! Ahora no tenemos que girar.

translation.en: Now we don't have to turn.
[comms officer] Sirs, there's still the horrifying space hole straight ahead.
translation.es: Señores, aún hay un horrible agujero en el espacio.

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Purple] Why are you so negative?
[The Tallest] Yay! Whoo-hoo!
-[Almighty Tallest Purple] Yeah-- -[electricity buzzes]
[Professor Membrane] Now, prepare your eating faces
translation.es: Ahora, preparen sus rostros de comer...

translation.en: for incalculable nutrition!
Good work, Foodio.
Thank you, Gazlene.
I hope you can taste the love simulation I made it with.
translation.es: Espero que puedas probar la simulación de amor con la que lo hice.

translation.en: -[heavy footsteps approach] -[Clembrane] Just one final ingwedient.
[laughs] Family and pudding and science and wobots and stuff.
translation.es: ¡La familia y el budín y la ciencia y los robots y así!

translation.en: -So, does he live here now or what? -[Gaz grunts]
[Professor Membrane] I'm still very confused. -[laughs] -[chuckles]
Enjoying your losers' meal, eh, Dib?
translation.es: Disfrutando de tu comida de perdedor, ¿no, Dib?

translation.en: "Losers"? Your plan failed.
Did it, Dib? Did it?
What if I told you my plan all along
translation.es: ¿Y si te dijera que mi plan siempre fue robar...

translation.en: was to steal this whatever-it-is?
translation.es: ¿Y si te dijera que mi plan siempre fue robar... esto, sea lo que sea?

translation.en: Phase Two. It was Phase Two all along.
translation.es: Fue la Fase Dos todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Is that the ceramic clown puppy from our living room?
translation.es: ¿Es el cachorro payaso de cerámica de nuestra sala?

translation.en: Who's laughing now, Dib?
I am, see? [laughing]
[Professor Membrane] Why didn't you invite your little green friend in for dinner, son?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no invitaste a cenar a tu amiguito verde, hijo?

translation.en: Dad, that was Zim, the alien who almost destroyed the world, remember?
translation.es: ¡Papá! Ese era Zim, el alienígena que casi destruyó el mundo, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Son, of course I remember.
I remember getting hit on the head and dreaming up all that crazy stuff.
translation.es: Recuerdo que me golpearon en la cabeza y soñé con todas esas locuras.

translation.en: What?
What's happening? Is everything over?
Yes, GIR, I'm just waiting for The Tallest
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasa? ¿Se acabó todo? - Sí, Gir. Estoy esperando que Los Altísimos contesten esta llamada

translation.en: to answer this call so I can tell them all about my success.
translation.es: Estoy esperando que Los Altísimos contesten esta llamada para contarles mi éxito.

translation.en: Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
-[inhales] -[screams] Did we win?
Of course. Zim always wins...
No thanks to you working with the enemy.
translation.es: No gracias a ti, que trabajaste con el enemigo.

translation.en: -[Minimoose squeaks] -Heh, good one, Minimoose. -I can't stay mad at you. -[screen buzzes]
translation.es: Ja, buena, Mini alce, no puedo estar enojado contigo.

translation.en: Ah, here we go.
My Tallest, I am pleased to report
translation.es: Mis Altísimos, me complace informar que mi plan fue un éxito

translation.en: my plan was a success and I now have Dib's puppy clown thing,
translation.es: Mis Altísimos, me complace informar que mi plan fue un éxito y ahora tengo el payaso cachorro de Dib,

translation.en: which was my plan all along.
translation.es: que era mi plan desde el principio.

translation.en: Does this please you?
That sounded like a yes to me.
translation.es: Eso me sonó como un sí.

translation.en: Yay! I missed you so much!
